question: Which is the only country that shares a land border with "Haiti"?
explanation: The Dominican Republic is the only country that shares a land border with "Haiti". Haiti is a country located on the island of Hispaniola in the Greater Antilles archipelago of the Caribbean Sea, to the east of Cuba and Jamaica and south of The Bahamas and the Turks and Caicos Islands. It occupies the western three-eighths of the island which it shares with the Dominican Republic.
